verses.verse: Now as <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> on his <S%H1870>way,<s%> the <S%H4397>angels<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6293>met<s%> him.

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H9201>when<s%> he <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, <S%H2088>"This<s%> is God's <S%H4264>camp.<s%>" So he <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4266>Mahanaim.<s%>

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him to his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>

He also <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3541>"Thus<s%> you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau:<s%> <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> "I have <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> with <S%H3837>Laban,<s%> and <S%H309>stayed<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now;<s%>

and I <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H7794>oxen<s%> and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> [and] <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H8198>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%><S%H8198>;<s%> and I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> that I may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight.<s%>"' "

And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "We <S%H935>came<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau,<s%> and <S%H1571>furthermore<s%> he is <S%H1980>coming<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> you, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> are with him."

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> and <S%H9503>distressed;<s%> and he <S%H2673>divided<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with him, and the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and the <S%H1241>herds<s%> and the <S%H1581>camels,<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>companies;<s%>

for he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>"If<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> to the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4264>company<s%> and <S%H5221>attacks<s%> it, then the <S%H4264>company<s%> which is <S%H7604>left<s%> will <S%H6413>escape.<s%>"

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H430>God<s%> of my father <S%H1>Abraham<s%> and <S%H85>God<s%> of my father <S%H430>Isaac,<s%> O <S%H1>Lord,<s%> who didst <S%H3327>say<s%> to me, <S%H3068>'Return<s%> to your <S%H559>country<s%> and to your <S%H7725>relatives,<s%> and I will <S%H776>prosper<s%> you,'

I am <S%H6994>unworthy<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H571>faithfulness<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thou hast <S%H6213>shown<s%> to Thy <S%H5650>servant;<s%> for with my <S%H4731>staff<s%> [only] I <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4264>companies.<s%>

<S%H5337>"Deliver<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H251>brother,<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> for I <S%H3372>fear<s%> him, <S%H6435>lest<s%> he <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H5221>attack<s%> me, the <S%H517>mothers<s%> with the <S%H1121>children.<s%>

"For Thou didst <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I will <S%H3190>surely<s%> <S%H3190>prosper<s%> you, and <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> be <S%H5608>numbered<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude.<s%>'"

So he <S%H3885>spent<s%> the <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%> Then he <S%H3947>selected<s%> from what he <S%H935>had<s%> with him a <S%H4503>present<s%> for his <S%H251>brother<s%> Esau: <S%H6215><s%>

two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H5795>female<s%> <S%H5795>goats<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8495>male<s%> <S%H8495>goats,<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7353>ewes<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H352>rams,<s%>

<S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3243>milking<s%> <S%H1581>camels<s%> and their <S%H1121>colts,<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H6510>cows<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6499>bulls,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H860>female<s%> <S%H860>donkeys<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H5895>male<s%> <S%H5895>donkeys.<s%>

And he <S%H5414>delivered<s%> [them] into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H5739>every<s%> <S%H5739>drove<s%> by <S%H905>itself,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H5674>"Pass<s%> on <S%H6440>before<s%> me, and <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7305>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H5739>droves.<s%>"

And he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H7223>one<s%> in <S%H7223>front,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>"When<s%> my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6215>Esau<s%> <S%H6298>meets<s%> you and <S%H7592>asks<s%> you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'To <S%H4310>whom<s%> do you belong, and <S%H575>where<s%> are you <S%H1980>going,<s%> and to <S%H4310>whom<s%> do <S%H428>these<s%> [animals] in <S%H6440>front<s%> of you belong?'

then you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> '[These] belong to your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob;<s%> it is a <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H6215>Esau.<s%> And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> us.' "

Then he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> and the <S%H7992>third,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> the <S%H5739>droves,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "After <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>manner<s%> you shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H6215>Esau<s%> when you <S%H4672>find<s%> him;

and you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H310>behind<s%> us.' "For he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will <S%H3722>appease<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him with the <S%H4503>present<s%> that <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me. Then <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I will <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6440>face;<s%> <S%H194>perhaps<s%> he will <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440><s%> me. "
So the <S%H4503>present<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> on <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, while he <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H3885>spent<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

Now he <S%H6965>arose<s%> that <S%H1931>same<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8198>maids<s%> and his <S%H259>eleven<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3206>children,<s%> and <S%H5674>crossed<s%> the <S%H4569>ford<s%> of the <S%H2999>Jabbok.<s%>
And he <S%H3947>took<s%> them and <S%H5674>sent<s%> them <S%H5674>across<s%> the <S%H5158>stream.<s%> And he <S%H5674>sent<s%> <S%H5674>across<s%> <S%H834>whatever<s%> he had.
Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> was <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H905>alone,<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H79>wrestled<s%> with him <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H7837>daybreak.<s%>

And when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had not <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against him, he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>socket<s%> of his <S%H3409>thigh;<s%> so the <S%H3709>socket<s%> of Jacob's <S%H3409>thigh<s%> was <S%H3363>dislocated<s%> while he <S%H79>wrestled<s%> with him.

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>"Let<s%> me <S%H7971>go,<s%> for the <S%H7837>dawn<s%> is <S%H5927>breaking.<s%>" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will not <S%H7971>let<s%> you <S%H7971>go<s%> <S%H3588>unless<s%> <S%H518><s%> you <S%H1288>bless<s%> me."
So he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"What<s%> is your <S%H8034>name<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>"Jacob.<s%>"

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Your <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> be <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> but <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> for you have <S%H8280>striven<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%> and with <S%H376>men<s%> and have <S%H3201>prevailed.<s%>"

Then <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7592>asked<s%> him and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> <S%H5046>tell<s%> me your <S%H8034>name.<s%>" But he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> is it that you <S%H7592>ask<s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%>?" And he <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him <S%H8033>there.<s%>

So <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H6439>Peniel,<s%> for [he said,] "I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face,<s%> yet my <S%H5315>life<s%> has been <S%H5337>preserved.<s%>"
Now the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>rose<s%> upon him <S%H9201>just<s%> as he <S%H5674>crossed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6439>Penuel,<s%> and he was <S%H6760>limping<s%> on his <S%H3409>thigh.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> do not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> of the <S%H5384>hip<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3709>socket<s%> of the <S%H3409>thigh,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he <S%H5060>touched<s%> the <S%H3709>socket<s%> of Jacob's <S%H3409>thigh<s%> in the <S%H1517>sinew<s%> of the <S%H5384>hip.<s%>
